title: Particle motion from acceleration function part - a

content.description: A particle moves along the x-axis in such a way that its acceleration at time t for t ≥ 0 is given by a(t)=4cos(2t) . At time t = 0 , the velocity of the particle is v(0)=1 and its position is x(0)=0 .
content.question: Write an equation for the velocity v(t) of the particle.

frqParts.text: Write an equation for the velocity v(t) of the particle.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
